description: Creates a new multimedia message (MMS) and sends it to a recipient's phone number.

parameters.name: DestinationPhoneNumber
parameters.description: The destination phone number in E.164 format.

parameters.name: OriginationIdentity
parameters.description: The origination identity of the message. This can be either the PhoneNumber, PhoneNumberId, PhoneNumberArn, SenderId, SenderIdArn, PoolId, or PoolArn.

parameters.name: MediaUrls
parameters.description: An array of URLs to each media file to send. The media files have to be stored in an S3 bucket. Supported media file formats are listed in MMS file types, size and character limits. For more information on creating an S3 bucket and managing objects, see Creating a bucket, Uploading objects in the Amazon S3 User Guide, and Setting up an Amazon S3 bucket for MMS files in the Amazon Web Services End User Messaging SMS User Guide. (string) ---

parameters.name: Context
parameters.description: You can specify custom data in this field. If you do, that data is logged to the event destination. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: MessageId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the message.
